message: Verizon iPhones users are on version 4.2.8...thought you might be interested to know.  I verified that this is the current and correct version at the Genius Bar here in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

Also, this 4.2.8 version for Verizon users does not make available some of the advanced iCloud download features available in 4.3, that everyone is talking about.   Which explains why I could never find these talked about features.

I'm surprised it's taking Apple so long to update the Verizon iPhone. I wonder if Verizon requires more lead time for this stuff than AT&T. There isn't anything that exciting about 4.3, but if Verizon customers don't get iOS 5 on time, people will be very upset.
